attributes.title: Lead Generation Specialist (Remote)
attributes.description:
## Lead Generation Specialist (Remote)

RemotEmployees is opening a position for Lead Generator. We work in the B2B (business to business) sector in the international market.

Your main goal is to find potential clients for our company. This is an ideal vacancy for starting a career: we provide full training, so work experience is not required.

If you feel confident on the internet, have intermediate English skills and want to work remotely — this vacancy is for you.

## What You Will Do:

**Contact Search:** Search for target audience and companies on social networks (LinkedIn and others) and through search engines.

**Database Work:** Collection and systematization of information in Excel / Google Sheets.

**Business Correspondence:** Initial contact with potential partners, sending proposals (in English).

**Analysis:** Learn to distinguish "our" client from "not ours" (we will teach you how to do this effectively).

## Requirements:

**English Language** — B1+ level (Intermediate). You should be able to understand information on websites and conduct basic correspondence.

**Confident PC User:** Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Word) or Google Docs.

**Search Skills:** Ability to quickly find the necessary information on the internet.

**Personal Qualities:** Perseverance, punctuality, attention to detail.

## We Offer:

**Fully Remote Work:** No trips to the office.

**Training and Support:** We will teach you effective search methods and help you at all stages of work.

**Career Growth:** Opportunity to grow into a sales manager or department head.

**Convenient Schedule (your choice):**

* Day Shift: 09:00 – 18:00
* Evening Shift: 15:00 – 24:00

**Decent Payment:** Timely rate + bonuses for results.

## How to Join the Team?

Instead of a standard resume, we use a video interview format. This saves time and allows us to make a decision faster.

* Go to the link below.
* Record a short video (tell us about your skills and English level).
* Get a job invitation.

[Video Interview Link](/videointerview)
attributes.subTitle: Remote work vacancy, B2B sector, full training provided
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees is looking for Lead Generation Specialists. Find potential clients for our company. Full training provided, no experience required. Remote work, flexible schedule, stable payment.
